title: For Healthcare Providers
text: Looking to get listed on the site?  Please fill out the contact form below and someone from our team will reach out with details.

section.title: Why patients use us
section.content: There are many reasons individuals prefer not to use their insurance.  Privacy and financial are just two of those reasons.

section.title: What's the value?
section.content: This service was built to help people find valuable services, not get rich.  The monthly cost is less than a gourmet coffee.
